full_text.0: @RealBrysonGray And remember the “death penalty for drugs dealers” comment he said while praising chinas leader Xi Jinping and saying that’s who inspired him to execute drug dealers… I’ve never seen a popular political candidate say something so insane…

full_text.14: .@khamenei_ir  I urge you to immediately release all political prisoners. Thousands of protesters & dissidents have been arbitrarily detained for asking for their basic human rights. Using the death penalty to silence them is inhumane & unlawful. #NoToExecution #نه_به_اعدام
